note:
Dad, soon to be hubby, ex Royal Navy Artificer, now working with Railway Signalling. Slightly geeky, love gadgets and tinkering with things i know i shouldn't. Enjoy circuit training and walking to keep fit. I'm attempting to learn to play the drums, like Japanese Anime and when I have time I like to read Discworld books.

Loves - Red wine
Hates - Pineapple on pizza

Favourite Movies - Happy Gilmore, Guardians of the Galaxy, Sweet Home Alabama, Everything Everywhere All at Once, Pulp Fiction and True Romance.
